aroma.notes: Deep, ruddy, juicy aroma. Literally smelling hot lemon juice.

acidity.notes: Plump but not overbearing lemon juice burst (like lemonade). I still get other things.

sweetness.notes: Low, rounded sweetness, washes over tongue after initial lemon burst

body.notes: Thin, milky mouthfeel. Soft. But not watery.

finish.notes: Left with just a slight alkaline feel in mouth, cools down on tongue pleasantly, almost like a mint?

flavor: Instantly hit with a zingy lemon note, then I notice how milky the body is. Fairly neutral aftertaste (might be tea-ish) unlike previous pour. Overall quite good.
notes: Shallow, fast swirl with a little washing of the sides after bloom
